name: tree-sitter-manuscript-functions
description: Sibelius ManuScript function grammar for node-tree-sitter

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter generate && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter generate && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter test

author: Thomas Weber
